name: part_007
file: tmp_【#ラプラス生誕祭2023】特別番組：らぷらすといっしょ！みんなかつもくせよ！【ラプラス・ダークネス⧸ホロライブ】 [MSIxNFblrCY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: The group discusses drawing elephants and their experiences with them.
Preparing for the elephant drawing song challenge.
Shirakami Fubuki leads the group in an elephant drawing song.
The group reviews their elephant drawings and reacts to each other's work.
Takane Lui explains the criteria for selecting the winner of the elephant drawing.
Fubuki is announced as the winner, and the group reacts.
The second drawing theme, a crow (Karasu), is introduced.
The group discusses the crow theme and its relation to Laplus.
The group starts the crow drawing challenge with Iroha's imitation.
The group finishes their crow drawings and prepares for the presentation.

subtitles.original: さぁ、描き歌、象さんも描けるよね、いろはちゃんもね。
subtitles.english: Now, for the drawing song, you can draw an elephant too, right, Iroha-chan?

subtitles.original: はい、もちろん！象さん知ってる。
subtitles.english: Yes, of course! I know what an elephant is.

subtitles.original: 頭撫でられてますけど。忍者も象さん知らんよ。忍者なの？
subtitles.english: You're getting your head patted. Even ninjas don't know elephants. Are you a ninja?

subtitles.original: 吾輩、象さん乗ったことあるから分かるよ！
subtitles.english: I've ridden an elephant before, so I know!

subtitles.original: 吾輩も象さん見たことあるから分かる！
subtitles.english: I've seen an elephant before too, so I know!

subtitles.original: 違うもん、乗ったことあるもん！乗ったことあるもん！
subtitles.english: No, I've ridden one! I've ridden one!

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあいろはちゃんの象さんの描き歌...
subtitles.english: Alright, then Iroha-chan's elephant drawing song...

subtitles.original: レッツスタート！
subtitles.english: Let's start!

subtitles.original: ♪ 長いちくわと...
subtitles.english: ♪ A long chikuwa and...

subtitles.original: ♪ 4つのちょんちょこりん...
subtitles.english: ♪ Four little dots...

subtitles.original: ♪ 上が大きいお餅...
subtitles.english: ♪ A big rice cake on top...

subtitles.original: ♪ ぴょんと尻尾が生えたなら...
subtitles.english: ♪ If a tail pops out with a boing...

subtitles.original: ♪ 逆向きのかまぼこつけて...
subtitles.english: ♪ Attach a backwards fish cake...

subtitles.original: ♪ 丸とちょんちょんちょん、象さん！
subtitles.english: ♪ A circle and dot dot dot, an elephant!

subtitles.original: おー！すごい！
subtitles.english: Oh! Amazing!

subtitles.original: ほら、象さん！これ、この間公園で見た象さん見て！
subtitles.english: Look, an elephant! Look, this is the elephant I saw at the park the other day!

subtitles.original: 平日見て、この間見て。いや、かまぼこ書かなきゃいけなくなる...主観ですよね。
subtitles.english: I saw it on a weekday, just the other day. No, that would mean drawing a fish cake... that's just your subjective view, isn't it.

subtitles.original: 歌...何？あの、歌が一番なんかぽかったよ。
subtitles.english: The song... what? Um, that song was the most like one.

subtitles.original: 本当に？ぽかったぽかった。
subtitles.english: Really? It felt like it, it felt like it.

subtitles.original: かまぼこ、かまぼこ、ちょっとかまぼこ...
subtitles.english: Fish cake, fish cake, a bit of a fish cake...

subtitles.original: 描き歌だったから、ふわっとしていいのよ。ふわっとしても。
subtitles.english: It was a drawing song, so it's okay for it to be vague. Even if it is.

subtitles.original: でしょ、いいでしょ。めちゃめちゃ良い。すごいアピールしてる。
subtitles.english: Right? It's good, right? It's really good. She's really appealing.

subtitles.original: この中で一番子供心があった人にね、ワンポイントあげたいと思います。
subtitles.english: I'd like to give a point to the person who had the most childlike heart among us.

subtitles.original: ほら、お揃い！見て見て、正面見て、横向いてるの、象さん。
subtitles.english: Look, they match! Look look, looking forward, and looking to the side, the elephant.

subtitles.original: 公園で見た象さん、これだったでござる。
subtitles.english: The elephant I saw in the park was just like this.

subtitles.original: えー、じゃあ、戦った象さん、これ...
subtitles.english: Eh, well then, the elephant I fought, this...

subtitles.original: じゃあ、子供っぽい子供心を残していた人は...
subtitles.english: Now, the person who kept their childlike heart...

subtitles.original: フブキちゃん！
subtitles.english: Fubuki-chan!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: なんかね、子供らしい言葉選びでね、描き歌をしていたなということで。
subtitles.english: It's because your choice of words was very childlike while doing the drawing song.

subtitles.original: フブキ社長、ちょっと空気がすごい冷めてるけど大丈夫か？
subtitles.english: President Fubuki, the atmosphere has cooled down quite a bit, are you okay?

subtitles.original: あ、王冠つけたんだ。"WIN"って書いてね。
subtitles.english: Oh, you added a crown. And wrote "WIN".

subtitles.original: おしゃ。じゃあ、吾輩やめる。やめないで、やめないで。
subtitles.english: Nice. Well then, I'm quitting. Don't quit, don't quit.

subtitles.original: それじゃあみんな、二つ目のお題はこちら！
subtitles.english: Now everyone, the second theme is this!

subtitles.original: カラス！
subtitles.english: A crow!

subtitles.original: カラスです！
subtitles.english: It's a crow!

subtitles.original: おー、来たね、カラスちゃんが来ました。
subtitles.english: Oh, it's here, the crow has arrived.

subtitles.original: みんなカラス、このカラス書けるかな？
subtitles.english: Can everyone draw this crow?

subtitles.original: 可愛いカラスちゃん描いてください。
subtitles.english: Please draw a cute crow.

subtitles.original: ラプラスちゃんはカラス描けるよね、もちろん。だっていつも一緒よ。
subtitles.english: Laplus-chan can draw a crow, right? Of course. Because you're always together.

subtitles.original: あ、いつも一緒？
subtitles.english: Ah, always together?

subtitles.original: うん。え、先生、それがラプラス・ダークネスなんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Yeah. Wait, teacher, isn't that Laplus Darkness herself?

subtitles.original: 違うよ！あれがラプちゃんなの？この子が。確かに。
subtitles.english: No! Is that Lap-chan? This one. Indeed.

subtitles.original: お前ら、鳥だと思ってんじゃねーよ、この野郎！
subtitles.english: You guys, don't just think of him as a bird, you bastards!

subtitles.original: 誰が、これ誰ユーザー？やばい。そうじゃない。
subtitles.english: Wait, who's the user? Oh no. That's not it.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、行くか、行くよ、みんな大丈夫かな？カラス、これ見本見ながら大丈夫だからね。
subtitles.english: Now, let's go, let's go, is everyone ready? It's fine to look at the reference for the crow.

subtitles.original: はい、それではシンキングタイム、スタート！
subtitles.english: Okay, then thinking time, start!

subtitles.original: あのね、いろはちゃんがカラスの真似上手いよ。
subtitles.english: You know, Iroha-chan is really good at imitating a crow.

subtitles.original: あ、やってくれる？
subtitles.english: Oh, will you do it?

subtitles.original: 任せて！行くよ。
subtitles.english: Leave it to me! Here I go.

subtitles.original: (カラスの真似：カァ！)嘘でした！嘘でした！ごめんなさい。
subtitles.english: (Crow imitation: Caw!) Just kidding! Just kidding! Sorry.

subtitles.original: みんな書けたかな？書けた、吾輩繋げてる、ラプラスに。
subtitles.english: Is everyone done? Done, I'm connecting it to Laplus.

subtitles.original: 一番自信があるよって人、手挙げて！
subtitles.english: Raise your hand if you're the most confident!

subtitles.original: はーい！あ、フブキちゃんはちょっとあんまり...恥ずかしいの？
subtitles.english: Me! Ah, Fubuki-chan is a bit... are you embarrassed?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、誰が一番やるかな？
subtitles.english: It's okay, who will go first?

subtitles.original: ごめん、全然聞こえなかった。なんて言った？
subtitles.english: Sorry, I couldn't hear you at all. What did you say?

subtitles.original: 見てほしいにゃん。
subtitles.english: I want you to see it, nyan.

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあラプラスちゃんから行こうかな。
subtitles.english: Okay, then let's start with Laplus-chan.

subtitles.original: では、ラプラスちゃんのカラスの...
subtitles.english: Now, Laplus-chan's crow...
